file_content.text: The air lock's closed. We're safe. These are the people who attacked the station? Who are they?
Individuals who draw on the dark side of the Force and have no mercy. We call them Sith.
They're Sith.
Stay close. These Sith are cutting down all resistance.
Dangerous. Be careful.
Like the ones on the Fortitude, when you rescued us.
Quietly. Do you want to alert the enemy to our presence?
Keep it down.
I don't care if they hear me. I want those trespassers out of our station.
There must be somebody still alive. We built Attis Station to survive anything.
Yes, here! Some of the science staff are in another wing, behind a security door.
With luck, they got inside before the enemy spotted them.
Hopefully unnoticed.
Maybe we can sneak them out? If there's--oh no.
Can you tell if there are any soldiers watching the door?
Are they guarded?
Let me see. There's no one watching them. Maybe the Sith don't--wait.
Just open the door so we can get those people out.
Then unlock it.
No, wait! I can't open it yet.
Look. There's an entire group of Sith headed that way. If they get in, the scientists--it'll be like the Fortitude again!
Just like I said. These Republic scum have bolt holes everywhere. Let's get rid of them before the Sith take credit.
No. I won't let it happen again. I won't!
Go! Get my override code from the console and protect the scientists. I'll handle this.
How can you have that kind of power?
You're Force sensitive?
Then may the Force be with you, Nadia.
All right. Be careful.
This is insane.
You're wasting time! You have to stop those Sith from reaching the scientists.
Jedi, I can do this! Please, trust me. Like I trust you.
Conserve your energy, keep your mind focused and let the Force flow through you.
Stay calm and strong.
I'll remember, I promise.
Don't get hurt or your father will never forgive me.
Come back in one piece.
If you wish to be reckless and foolish, go ahead.
Do whatever you want.
Ugh--you'll end up on a dissecting table for that, girl.
You'll have to catch me, first.
You go, I'll get this door shut behind us.
